entry.title: Frozen Persicor
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Frozen
Price: 15.99 - 49.99 (19 variants)

This flavor contains a medley of juicy peaches along with sharp, yet sweet blackcurrants and topped off with the signature VanGo cooling blend!

Some even consider it indescribable with its exotic blackcurrant tones and notes of peach that make it a unique & sweet fruit blend. It’s loaded with flavor, from those juicy peach undertones that make every hit simply perfect!

We took things a bit further with an extra touch of VanGo’s proprietary cooling and combined it with only the sweetest Peaches and Blackcurrants!

VG Ratios:

  • 0, 3 and 6mg - 70% VG
  • 12 and 18mg - 60% VG
  • All salt variants - 50% VG

Note: All our salts are made from benzoic acid free nicotine salts!

entry.title: Frozen Sophene
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Frozen
Price: 15.99 - 49.99 (19 variants)

One of the newest additions to the Frozen Collection is now our top selling flavor, Frozen Sophene. This tropical e-liquid is the perfect combination of strawberries, pineapple and a drizzle of menthol.

The real secret to this flavor is the guava that adds a new dimension to this tropical e-juice. Frozen Sophene is the perfect all day vape for vapers seeking a tropical flavor or vapers looking to explore menthol flavors without feeling overwhelmed from the cold. 

VG Ratios:

  • 0, 3 and 6mg - 70% VG
  • 12 and 18mg - 60% VG
  • All salt variants - 50% VG

Note: All our salts are made from benzoic acid free nicotine salts!

entry.title: Frozen Waterberry
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Frozen
Price: 15.99 - 49.99 (19 variants)

One of our top selling menthol flavors in the Frozen collection. Frozen Waterberry will satisfy the vapers looking for a fruity and menthol combination. This e-liquid is a blend of juicy watermelon, sweet strawberries and kiwi that will blow you away from the fruity explosion.
